targetLine.text: Oh, look how worn out this is. Your father's biggest problem, Marlene, is that he loses all self-control when someone calls him chicken.
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part II

contextBefore.text: Well, when the scene screen repairman called Daddy a chicken, Daddy threw him out of the house. Now we can't get anybody to fix it.

contextAfter.text: How many times have we heard it, George?
"Mom, I can't let them think I'm chicken." "Can't let them think I'm chicken." You're right. Well, you're right!
About 30 years ago, your father tried to prove he wasn't chicken, and he ended up in an automobile accident.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
